nodes.text: Jeffrie was a male individual who owned a chocolate shop in Tiquwe, a town on the planet Aloxor. When Eli Vanto and Brierly Ronan were captured by criminals led by Sisay while on a mission assigned to them by Grand Admiral Thrawn, Vanto demanded to speak in the privacy of the nearest building. Sisay ordered her associate Skulk to tell Jeffrie to leave his shop for some time.
